titleStmt.title: A Generall bill for this present yeere, ending the 16 of December 1630 according to the report made to the Kings Most Excellent Ma[jes]tie by the Company of the Parish Clerks of London, &c.
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

notesStmt.note: Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
STC (2nd ed.) 16743 also includes the Bill of Mortality for the year ending 15 December 1631.
